lead_paragraph: The arrests last year took place even as social attitudes toward the drug changed. A disproportionate number of those arrested are African-Americans.

headline.print_headline: Study Finds Disparities in Arrests for Marijuana
headline.main: Marijuana Arrests Outnumber Those for Violent Crimes, Study Finds

snippet: The arrests last year took place even as social attitudes toward the drug changed. A disproportionate number of those arrested are African-Americans....
abstract: Report issued by American Civil Liberties Union and Human Rights Watch finds disproportionate number of African-Americans are being arrested and prosecuted for possessing marijuana for personal use, even though their rate of use is similar to whites; criminologists say disproportion is largely due to police practice of flooding high crime area with officers to make arrests for any offense.
